item.title: French Government and Nestlé Accused of Cover-Up in Perrier Water Scandal
item.description: An inquiry found that Nestlé and French officials had concealed the company’s practice of filtering Perrier water it labels “natural.” The head of Nes...

item.title: School Bus Bombing in Pakistan Kills at Least 6, Including 4 Students
item.description: The vehicle was carrying dozens of children to a military-run school in southwestern Balochistan Province, a region long roiled by rebel activity.

item.title: Putin Visits Kursk for First Time Since Russia Drove Out Ukrainian Forces
item.description: The Russian leader traveled to the region in the west of the country where a surprise incursion last year embarrassed Moscow.

item.title: Hong Kong Journalists Say Their Taxes Are Now Under Scrutiny
